SEARCH
Package com.example.hive.Models

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.hive.Models.User
public class User extends Object
Represents a user in the Hive application. This class includes user details such as device ID, username, email, phone number, role, and profile image. The user can have multiple roles and notifications settings.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String deviceId, String userName, String email, String phoneNumber, String role, List<String> roleList, com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String profileImageUrl)
      Constructor for creating a user with known details.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The device ID.
      userName - The name of the user.
      email - The email address of the user.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the user (optional).
      role - The current role of the user.
      roleList - All roles the user can have.
      db - The Firebase Firestore database instance.
      profileImageUrl - The URL of the user's profile image.

    • User

      public User()
      Default constructor for creating a user with default details.

      public boolean getNotificationChosen()

      Parameters:

    • generateInitialsDrawable

      private android.graphics.drawable.Drawable generateInitialsDrawable()
      Generates an initials profile picture if no profile picture is uploaded.
      Returns:
      A Drawable representing the initials.

    • getDisplayDrawable

      public android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getDisplayDrawable()
      Gets either the profile image URL or the initials drawable.
      Returns:
      The Drawable representing the user's display picture, or null if a profile image URL is available.
